scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Forums_CreateEditPost_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($forum = false) #set($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'thread') #set($threadOrReply = false) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = false) #if($core_v2_forumReply.Current) #set($threadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #if (!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_ModifyPost',"%{PostType='replies',PostId=$threadOrReply.Id}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #elseif($core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($threadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'thread') #if(!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_ModifyPost',"%{PostType='threads',PostId=$threadOrReply.Id}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #elseif ($core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToType = 'reply') #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #if (!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get("forums", $forum.Id, "Forum_CreateReply", "%{PostId=$replyToThreadOrReply.Id, PostType='replies'}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #elseif ($core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToType = 'thread') #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #if (!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get("forums", $forum.Id, "Forum_CreateReply", "%{PostId=$replyToThreadOrReply.Id, PostType='threads'}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #elseif(!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_CreatePost').IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($contextId = $core_v2_uploadedFile.CreateContextId()) #set($uploadUrl = $core_v2_page.AdjustQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('uploadfile.vm'), "uploadFileUrl=$core_v2_encoding.UrlEncode($core_v2_uploadedFile.GetUploadUrl($contextId))")) #set($tempData = false) #if ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tsid')) #set($tempDataString = false) #set($tempDataString = $core_v2_utility.GetTemporaryData($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tsid'))) #if($tempDataString) #set($tempData = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($tempDataString)) #end #end
#if ($replyToThreadOrReply) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_Title_EditMessageDesc'), $replyToThreadOrReply.Subject) #elseif ($replyToThreadOrReply) $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_Inline1') #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_Title_PostNewMessageDesc') #end
    #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.EnableThreadStatus && $forum.AllowedThreadTypes.Count > 1) #set($threadType = $forum.DefaultThreadType) #set($threadType = $threadOrReply.ThreadType)
    • #end #if ($replyToThreadOrReply)
  • $replyToThreadOrReply.Body('WebQuote') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Button_Quote')
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread')
    • #end
  • #set($body = '') #if($threadOrReply) #set($body = $threadOrReply.Body('raw')) #elseif($tempData) #set($body = $tempData.Value('body')) #end $core_v2_editor.Render('PostBody', "%{Width='97%', Height='250px', Value=$body}")
    • #if(!$sitecore_v2_configuration.AutoRedirectUsers)
    • #end #if (!$threadOrReply && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
    • #end #if ($threadOrReply && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.DisplayEditNotes)
    • #end
    #if ($uploadUrl && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_AttachFileLocal').IsAllowed || $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_AttachFileRemote').IsAllowed)
  • $!threadOrReply.File.FileName #if ($threadOrReply && $threadOrReply.File) $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_UpdateAttachment')#else $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_AddAttachment')#end $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_RemoveAttachment')
    • #end #if($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('Site_FeatureContent').IsAllowed)
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_Moderate').IsAllowed)
    • #end #if ($replyToThreadOrReply) #set($replyToThread = false) #if($replyToType == 'reply') #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Get($replyToThreadOrReply.ThreadId)) #else #set($replyToThread = $replyToThreadOrReply) #end #if($replyToThread && $replyToThread.ThreadType == 'QuestionAndAnswer')
    • #end #end #if ($core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.EnableUserPostingAsAnonymous && $forum.EnableAnonymousPosting)
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_PinPost').IsAllowed) #set($daysFromToday = 0) #set($daysFromToday = $threadOrReply.StickyDate.Date.Subtract($core_v2_utility.CurrentDate.Date).TotalDays) #if(!$threadOrReply.IsSticky) #set($daysFromToday = 0) #end
    • #end
#if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,'Forum_CreatePoll').IsAllowed)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_IncludePoll_Details')
  • #if($threadOrReply) #foreach($pollItem in $core_v2_forumThread.ListPollItems($threadOrReply.Id))       #nodata $core_v2_language.GetResource('PollEditor_NoAnswers') #end #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('PollEditor_NoAnswers') #end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('PollEditor_ExpiresAfter')
#end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_PostButton')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.createEditPost') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #set($tags = '') #if($forum) #foreach($tag in $core_v2_forum.ListTags("%{ForumId=$forum.Id}")) #each #set($tags = "$tags'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_encoding.HtmlDecode($tag.Name))'") #between #set($tags = "$tags,") #end #end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Forums_CreateEditPost_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Extensions.SitecoreConnect" /> <property id="showForumInHeader" resourceName="CF_ShowForumInHeader" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Creates or edits a forum post.
Write your reply below. Click the "Post" button to submit your message.
Use the form below to write the message. Click the "Post" button to submit your message.
Email me replies to this post
Do not display my personal information with this post.
Include a Poll in this Post
When included, the poll's placement within the post can be controlled by placing a [Poll] tag within this post's message.
No answers are defined for this poll
When selecting text to quote, only text from the original post can be selected. Please correct or remove your text selection.
* Please enter a subject before posting.
* Posts must have some content in the body and quote blocks must match.
Are you sure you want to delete this answer?
